title: Events | Advancement | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: It all starts with a single spark          Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Advancement     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Advancement      Advancement   Main Menu    UIC Alumni Association           Alumni Exchange    Events    Awards and Traditions    Class Notes    Volunteer    Alumni Benefits    Alumni Career Services         IGNITE:  The Campaign for UIC           Give Now    IGNITE Priorities    Understanding Giving         Stories           Extraordinary Alumni    IGNITE Campaign    Student Successes    Driving Discovery    Empowering Faculty    Community Connections         About Advancement           Directory    Connect to College    Advancement Careers          Eyebrow menu    Give Now    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Advancement    UIC Alumni Association    Events        Events  To mitigate the risk to members of our community of contracting and spreading COVID-19, all in-person university-sponsored events are suspended until further notice. For the latest information, please visit UIC's COVID-19 web page .  Connect with Us Online  While we cannot meet in person, the UICAA invites you to join us for Alumni Exchange , our new virtual event series. Join us at: Facebook , Twitter , Instagram and LinkedIn . Or email us at uicalumni@uic.edu.
